about_the_game: 18+ DLC for additional Adult Only content for "Detective Rosie Morgan: Death at a Dinner Party"

content_descriptors.notes: This game contains female to female romantic relationships, sexual scenes, nudity, strong language, use of tobacco and alcohol and mature humour. There are references to suicide, murder, and spousal abuse, but in context of the police investigation, It is recommended for mature audiences only.
